snippet: Nokia on Monday introduced the Lumia 900, a smartphone that the Finnish cellphone maker and its software collaborator, Microsoft, hope will finally lead to redemption in the smartphone market.
abstract: Nokia on Monday introduced the Lumia 900, a smartphone that the Finnish cellphone maker and its software collaborator, Microsoft, hope will finally lead to redemption in the smartphone market.

headline.main: With Lumia 900, Nokia and Microsoft Bid for Smartphone Relevance
